trans-unit.source: Enumerates types of speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os tipos de eventos de synthesis de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Custom speech synthesis engines define the types of events submitted to the Speech platform synthesizer infrastructure with the TtsEventId.
trans-unit.target: Motores de synthesis de reconhecimento de voz personalizadas definem os tipos de eventos foi submetidos para a infraestrutura de sintetizador de plataforma de voz com o TtsEventId.

trans-unit.source: Specification is performed by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instances passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> member of the class implementing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interface passed to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a custom speech engine's implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Especificação é realizada definindo a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>instâncias transmitido para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A>Membro da classe de implementar a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>interface transmitido para o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>método de implementação de um motor de reconhecimento de voz personalizadas de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.AddEvents%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Speech platform infrastructure indicates the type of events it is currently handling through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> passed to the speak implementation.
trans-unit.target: Infraestrutura da plataforma de voz indica o tipo de eventos que está atualmente a processar através de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite>transmitido para a implementação de speak.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> is a bitmask, where the members of TtsEventId define the location of the bit corresponding to the event type.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>é uma máscara de bits, onde os membros de TtsEventId definem localização do bits correspondente para o tipo de evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, WordBoundary has a value of five (5), meaning the fifth bit in the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> indicates if the site supports the event type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, WordBoundary tem um valor de cinco (5), que significa que o bit quinto no valor devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>indica se o site suporta o tipo de evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes an audio level change while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor conclui uma alteração de nível de áudio durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a bookmark while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor encontra um marcador durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters the end of its input stream while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar o motor de detetar o fim do seu fluxo de entrada durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a phoneme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor conclui uma phoneme durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a sentence while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor conclui uma frase durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine a begins speaking a stream.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar o motor de uma começa falando uma transmissão em fluxo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a viseme while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor conclui uma viseme durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine encounters a change of Voice while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar o motor de detetar uma alteração de voz durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies events generated when a speech synthesize engine completes a word while speaking.
trans-unit.target: Identifica os eventos gerados quando uma voz sintetizar motor conclui uma palavra durante a fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
